title: Onyx
description: In Onyx, DC's newest fetish club, Ian Vaughan, a Dom returning to the scene, finds himself greatly interested in the crowd favorite: Kale Daniels. After observing a tense, staged whipping, Ian takes Kale for a private session of their own. Can these two men form a bond that goes beyond the public sphere of Onyx?
author: Shayne Carmichael
